column5: The result of alot of hard work no pay and athrough enjoyment of the Team  :clapping: What it means is more time less fishing and a chance to meet and evaluate other CCGA Crews in the Central Arctic Region
I am very impressed, congradulations on a difficult achievement.   How long did it take to get this recognition?
Congrats !!!!!!!!!!!!  Something that I've always admired and wanted to be a part of...  Best of luck to you !!!!   Tiz

Wow, congratulations Peter.  I always knew you weren't just a Fairweather Friend  Seriously, that's truely inspiring and something you should be proud of.  I know I'm proud of you  See you soon at Qunite.  Joey
congrats bud!!
Wow Peter!  What an accomplishment!  Congrats on your certification...something to be very proud of!
Yea, thats awesome Peter, very cool stuff. Congrats and kudos to you.

WOW congratulations peter !!!!!!   thats quite an achievement,as well as something to be proud of.....to be a member of SAR.  . it goes to show everyone that hard work,and determination pays off big time....cheers
Just rescue my arse when Cliff catches the big one in my boat and the damn thing pulls us under ok?!!!!!!!?? No seriously rescue us.. LOL  congrats brother!  Gerritt.
Congrats Pete on this major accomplishment !!!!  Now that you have some spare time...clean up our teams progress would ya ! LOL
congrats on your accomplishment
BZ, Good Show.
Congrats Peter!!!!  Maureen
Good stuff Pete, you guys do an awesome  job !!
....Very impressive Pete and undoubtedly well deserved. Congratulations
Well done Pete, Congratulations! -Brian

Thanks all for the compliments It was 11 of us from all over the Central Arctic Region at the RHIOT School in Hamilton(Rigid Hull Inflatable Trainer) We had guys from units all over, Northwest Territories, Pickering Grimsby Hamilton Sarnia and places beyond. Each of us was selected from their respective units to participate All units are usually looking for volunteers and more then willing to have a look It is a rewarding passtime and something I would imagine I will stay with until I cant stand up anyway It does have a large adrenalin factor I wont lie But when it all comes down we are out there for you   Thanks Peter  P.S. Wayne im going to unlock the tourney board so you can drop your pictures on it.........by the way nice haul of ski's
Atta boy Peter...
Congrats!  So now we know who to consult with for our boating safety needs  Tony
We do complimentery boat checks....we are not enforcement we will tell you good or bad thats it just call TOWARF or let me know
